org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowMediaPlayer

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowMediaPlayer

@Implements(value=android.media.MediaPlayer.class)
public class ShadowMediaPlayer
extends Object

Shadows the Android MediaPlayer class.
